title: Enhancing e-Learning Practical Skills: Foundational Understanding of Multi-IRS-Assisted MIMO-NOMA Networks

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the core components of a multi-IRS-assisted MIMO-NOMA system.
Learners can understand the fundamental principles of adaptive user pairing (AUP) techniques and analyze real-world applications.
Learners can explain the interactions of key variables (precise coding, phase shifting, user pairing) for optimizing spectral efficiency (SE).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
